docs.lead_paragraph: A recent report raised concerns about women of childbearing age sharing prescription drugs. While the focus of the study was on drug sharing, readers of the Well blog took the discussion in an entirely different direction.
docs.abstract: Are doctors so obsessed with a woman's reproductive health that they forget to treat the whole patient?
docs.snippet: Are doctors so obsessed with a woman's reproductive health that they forget to treat the whole patient?

docs.lead_paragraph: A ruling upholding the law would be a setback for the government of President Felipe Calderón, which filed a legal challenge after the law was approved.

docs.lead_paragraph: Sue Makin is an American Presbyterian missionary doctor working at a 190-bed mission hospital in southern Malawi. She has been working in Africa for the past 18 years. According to a 2007 study of global maternal mortality rates, more than two-thirds of deaths among Malawian women of reproductive age are linked to pregnancy or childbirth - a larger proportion than in any of the 171 countries in the study.
docs.abstract: A veteran missionary doctor in Africa describes the power of tradition in decision making about childbirth in a village in Mozambique.
docs.snippet: A veteran missionary doctor in Africa describes the power of tradition in decision making about childbirth in a village in Mozambique.

docs.lead_paragraph: Though Senator Barack Obama told us - really, teased us - on Thursday that he had picked a running mate, he offered scant hints about who it is, but characterized it as a difficult decision.
